meanings.sent1: The coilability of the wire made it easy to wrap around the pole.
meanings.sent2: The snake's coilability allowed it to quickly constrict its prey.
meanings.sent3: The spring's coilability was so impressive that it decided to enter a coiling competition.
meanings.sent4: Her hair's coilability resembled a tightly wound spring ready to bounce.
meanings.sent5: The coilability of the hose made it effortless to store in a small space.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to form coils.
meanings.sent1: The metal's coilability was evident in its ability to bend easily into loops.
meanings.sent2: The material's coilability made it perfect for creating spiral designs.
meanings.sent3: The coilability of the dough was so good that it decided to become a professional pretzel maker.
meanings.sent4: The coilability of the vines in the garden created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The wire's coilability allowed it to be shaped into intricate coil structures.

meanings.definition: The property of being easily wound into a coil.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's coilability made it simple to roll up into a tight bundle.
meanings.sent2: The rope's coilability was crucial for neatly storing it on the boat.
meanings.sent3: The coilability of the slinky toy entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The coilability of the yarn resembled a neatly wound ball ready for knitting.
meanings.sent5: The cable's coilability allowed for easy organization in the workshop.
